title: Amnesty International Exits Hong Kong, Citing National Security Law
content:
1. Amnesty International Exits Hong Kong, Citing National Security Law  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Amnesty to close Hong Kong offices over National Security Law  BBC News
  3. Rights group Amnesty International to shut Hong Kong offices  Reuters
  4. With New Conviction, Hong Kong Uses Security Law to Clamp Down on Speech  The New York Times
